item.title: Installing Rails on CentOS7

item.title: FizzBuzz(Ruby)
item.description: I tried to solve FizzBuzz with Ruby. It's interesting to see the differences between different languages when creating FizzBuzz. (adsbygoogle = window.adsbygoogle || []).

item.title: Web Testing Campe(Ruby)
item.description: This is a sample code for web testing. When I'm looking for a job, I often see competition programming in web tests, so I put it together.

item.title: Array(Ruby)
item.description: It's about Ruby arrays. Recently, I've been doing some competition programming in Ruby. I'm worried about when to migrate to C++. (adsbygoogle = window.
